name: k-llm
description: Multi-model consensus engine. 5 AI models analyze your prompt through their native strengths, then one synthesizes the result.
author: Josh Adler

skills.name: consensus
skills.description: Run a multi-model consensus analysis on any prompt. 5 AI models (Claude, GPT, DeepSeek, Llama, Gemini) each analyze through their native lens, then a synthesis layer fuses all perspectives.

prompt.description: The prompt to analyze with 5 models

verbose.description: Show individual analyst responses in addition to consensus
